scenario.name: UAC with Audio
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:1001@localhost:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:1001@localhost:5060> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 18 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:1001@localhost:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:1001@localhost:5060]>;tag=[peer_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:1001@localhost:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:1001@localhost:5060]>;tag=[peer_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
